body.p: Your petitioners Robt P Pepper states that he recently had a difficulty - with John B Lindsey & upon trail before John R Graham Police Judge of Frankfort on Saturday May 14th he was fined $20 for a breach of the peace and upon another warrant he was fined $50 for carrying a concealed deadly weapon

Petitioner does not ask or desire a remission of the $20 fine but he does ask a remission of the $50 fine. He is not in the habit generally of carrying deadly weapons but in these troubled times he regards it as a right that every citizen has to carry weapons

Having remitted every case of concealed weapons presented since the rebellion upon the principle that during the rebellion every loyal man should be priveleged to carry weapons
I order the remission except fees and costs
